author: dbertoni
msg: Gussied up the display of options.  Added better error handling for reading argv.  Updated version number (again).

author: dbertoni
msg: Moved code to allocate buffers into constructor body so that only one of the buffers is allocated.  Decreased size of the the internal buffer, and added code to null-terminate the buffer to make writing more efficient.

author: dbertoni
msg: Removed exception catching, and added call to flush PrintWriter in the destructor.
